Good Comments: I'm extremely grateful that they took on Gokinjo Monogatari when no one else did, and the episodes they have subbed have been good quality. Only problem would be the speed of the subs, they haven't released any new GM episodes in almost a year.
Translations are 95% spot on and the timing looks good :)
Countless minor typo mistakes, so insane. though -> thought. how -> who (who did you do that?! [WTF]). and a butt ton more. How did they even get +24 approve?!
Great opening and closing sub style
Holo-Anime used their subs so they get the credit I guess.
Bad Comments: they often get translations wrong. sutoobu, yes, literally is stove, but it actually means "heater." Same for meeru/email and "text message." I'm always noticing errors like this!
decent, but odd font and some typos.
It used a font I could read xD
The picked up where Ureshii left off
I think it has the best translation and the overall quality is good^_^
Classic sub team. Good translation, good quality.
